urls.title: Green
urls.description: A whole new way to fly.

data.text:
💡 Did you know that Frontier saved 125 million gallons of fuel in 2019 alone. That's the equivalent of 243,000 cars removed from the road for one year!

Ready to fly greener? Learn more here: https://t.co/XZIrMpt59f

#AmericasGreenestAirline #FlyFrontier #FrontierAirlines https://t.co/HKmyYjvPKI

Here at Frontier, we celebrate diversity and inclusion. This year, we are observing #BlackHistoryMonth by featuring employees whose colleagues and supervisors nominated them.⁠
⁠
Get to know our featured employees here: https://t.co/GFHsGBddvr https://t.co/SOtDI2NdWq

urls.title: International Travel - Frontier
urls.description: Now is the perfect time to travel to Mexico and explore paradise! Find the lowest fares to the best Mexico locations. Some of our favorites include Cancun, Guatemala City, Guadalajara and more! Looking for a unique relaxing getaway? Book the Caribbean as your next adventure. Explore the majestic waterfalls of Jamaica, the turquoise waters of the Bahamas and so much more. When thinking about international travel, put Central America at the top of your list. Central America is known for it's archeological

data.text: INTERNATIONAL DESTINATIONS AWAIT! We're growing faster than ever! Did you know you can book flights to exciting international destinations like Guatemala, Jamaica, and The Bahamas? WATER you waiting for? https://t.co/wTFCu5dq8W https://t.co/TDJ9yk0Z21

urls.title: Green
urls.description: A whole new way to fly.

data.text:
Frontier saved 125 million gallons of fuel in 2019 alone. That's the equivalent of:

- 438 BILLION Straws Disappearing
- 18.6 BILLION Plastic Bottles Removed from Production
- 14 MILLION Seedlings Being Planted

Learn more here: https://t.co/Cae0UqpmuF 

#AmericasGreenestAirline https://t.co/QgRRZd5a1g

urls.title: Careers
urls.description: Our team members are the key to our success for providing low fares nationwide. Join our team and be a part of a rewarding and fast-paced industry.

data.text: We recently launched a new program designed to grow our future leaders and strengthen our diversity as a company – the Ascend Management Trainee Program. It's open to all Frontier employees and our business partners interested in opportunities at our HQ. https://t.co/iBbVtwubn3 https://t.co/YMGkTCC5hU

SAVE ON YOUR STAY WHEN YOU FLY TO ANTIGUA! 

Call @EliteIsland & provide a copy of your Frontier ticket to receive a resort credit valid at 1 of 5 all-inclusive resorts for the amount of your ticket!*  https://t.co/dJPxh4YM0U

📸: @antiguabarbuda 

*Terms and conditions apply. https://t.co/nu2RmTtJz0

entity.name: Remembering Betty White on her birthday
entity.description: The following Tweets are part of a live conversation detected by an algorithm.

entity.name: 🎂18日は山崎育三郎さんの誕生日
🎂18日は白井悠介さんの誕生日
Remembering Betty White on her 100th birthday 🎂
entity.description:
Legendary actress and comedian Betty White would have turned 100 years old on January 17, 2022. Her death came as a shock to the world, as she passed away weeks ahead of her birthday on December 31, 2021. 

Family, friends, and fans now join together to honor her memory and celebrate the icon’s long life:
- A special one-day-only movie event, now called Betty White: A Celebration, features a star-studded cast and airs in nearly 900 theaters across the US.
- Fans on social media participate in an unofficial #BettyWhiteChallenge with the goal of raising awareness and funds for one of White’s nearest and dearest causes - animals.  
- White's hometown of Oak Park, Illinois, is recognizing her birthday as “Betty White Day” and filling the village’s downtown area with memorabilia, performances, and festivities for the late star on January 15.

Share your favorite memory of Betty White and tell us how you are celebrating the legendary Emmy Award-winning actress on what would have been her 100th birthday!

data.text:
FA Gwendolyn Walker shared with us this photo taken in the 1960s of her grandfather, John E. Walker (center), a local minister in Denver, with close friend Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. (right).

We remember the inspiring message put forth by Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. #MLKDay https://t.co/AqNhYvl3FN
